amendment.description: Amendment eliminates the double surcharge on the CIA with regard to employees who retired or resigned under voluntary separation incentive payment plans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 2 in the Congressional Record of May 16, 1996, to eliminate the double surcharge on the CIA with regard to employees who retire or resign under voluntary spearation incentive payment plans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Combest amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
